about.title: African Innovation,
about.description1: DULU Sarl was born from the vision of transforming the African digital landscape. Based in Douala, our company combines technical expertise with a deep understanding of local needs to deliver innovative digital solutions.
about.description2: Our mission is to propel African businesses into the digital future by providing cutting-edge tools and services tailored to their specific needs.

services.subtitle: Tailored solutions to optimize your digital presence and automate your customer interactions

form.subject: Subject

fastcomPro.title: FastCom Pro

mediaBuying.title: Media Buying Excellence
mediaBuying.subtitle: Our expertise transforms your advertising campaigns into real growth engines

features.messageDesc: Writing impactful messages, optimized to captivate the target audience and make the offer irresistible.
features.titleDesc: Creation of catchy and engaging titles, adapted to the campaign objective.
features.imageDesc: Development or selection of creative and striking visuals, reinforcing the message.
features.targetingDesc: Precise settings to effectively reach the right audience (age, gender, interests, geolocation, etc.).
features.campaignDesc: Launch of ads with all necessary technical settings.
features.budgetDesc: Daily monitoring and strategic adjustments to maximize ROI.
features.reportDesc: Complete performance analysis: ROI, CPC, CTR, conversions, etc.
features.phoneAdviceDesc: Practical advice for effectively converting generated leads.

features.autoResponsesDesc: Intelligent system that responds instantly to your customers' messages 24/7.
features.customMessagesDesc: Responses adapted according to the type of request and customer profile.
features.fastProcessingDesc: Efficient handling of customer requests with instant and relevant responses.

productsServices.title: 2. Products and Services Offered
productsServices.products: Products: Meta ads advertising service and other social networks, and customer response automation service for entrepreneurs, business owners or managers
productsServices.intendedUse: Intended Use: These services allow users to improve their sales and free themselves from repetitive tasks.

orderPurchase.title: 3. Order and Purchase

steps.step1: Select desired products and add them to cart.
steps.step2: Confirm your order by following the indicated steps.
steps.step3: You will receive a confirmation email once the order is validated.

validation.title: Validation
validation.description: An order is considered final after:

conditions.email: Sending an email confirming receipt of your order.

orderPurchase.thirdParty: Note: Orders placed through third-party platforms, such as Facebook or Instagram, are subject to these platforms' usage policies in addition to these Terms of Service.

pricing.title: 4. Pricing and Billing

items.prices: Prices: Displayed prices are in Euro and will be added to applicable taxes.
items.additionalFees: Additional Fees: Delivery fees or specific taxes will be clearly indicated before order validation.
items.invoice: Billing: An invoice will be sent to the email address provided during ordering.

pricing.note: Note: Prices are subject to change, but changes do not affect already confirmed orders.

items.other: Other integrated payment platforms (subject to availability).

security.title: Payment Security
security.description: Transactions are secured via PayPal. No banking data is stored by DULU Sarl.

items.timing: Timing: Service is available immediately upon order confirmation.
items.coverage: Covered Areas: Africa, Europe, and North America.
items.fees: Delivery Fees: No delivery fees as these are services.

items.period: Withdrawal Period: You have 15 days from the start of service execution to exercise your right of withdrawal.
items.conditions: Conditions: The service must not have been started by DULU Sarl.
items.procedure: Procedure: Contact us at gaston.effa@gmail.com to formalize your desire to withdraw.

items.conformity: Conformity: Services conform to the description provided at the time of ordering.
items.liability: Liability Limit: DULU Sarl cannot be held responsible for delays due to external factors or inappropriate use of its services.

items.personalData: Personal Data: Your data is collected and used in accordance with our Privacy Policy for order processing.
items.cookies: Cookies: The site uses cookies to optimize user experience.
items.gdpr: GDPR Compliance: You can request modification or deletion of your data at any time via gaston.effa@gmail.com

disputes.title: 10. Disputes and Competent Jurisdictions
disputes.description: In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be preferred. If no agreement is reached, the dispute will be submitted to the competent courts of Douala in Cameroon.

facebook.title: Specific Facebook Mentions
facebook.description: DULU Sarl respects Facebook's commercial policies. Any interaction via Facebook Shop is also subject to the platform's rules. In case of conflict between the ToS and Facebook rules, the latter prevail for orders made on the platform.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At DULU Sarl, we are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect the information you provide when using our services.

dataCollection.title: 1. Data Collected
dataCollection.description: We collect different types of personal data, including:

items.personal: Personal Information: name, first name, email address, phone number.
items.technical: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, connection data.
items.usage: Usage Data: pages viewed, interactions with our services.

items.service: Provide, improve, and personalize our services.
items.orders: Process your orders and respond to your requests.
items.security: Ensure the security of our services.

dataSharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We share your data only in the following cases:

items.providers: With third-party service providers (payments, delivery, technical support) as part of service execution.
items.legal: In accordance with the law, to comply with legal obligations or requests from competent authorities.

storage.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
storage.description: Your data is stored on secure servers. We implement technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access, loss, or disclosure of your data.

retention.title: 5. Retention Period
retention.description: Your personal data is retained as long as necessary to achieve the purposes described in this policy or to meet our legal obligations.

items.rectification: Rectification or deletion of your data.
items.opposition: Opposition to the processing of your data.
items.withdrawal: Withdrawal of your consent for commercial communications.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your user experience. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies.

changes.title: 8. Changes to the Privacy Policy
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify this policy at any time. Any changes will be published on our website.

contact.description: To exercise your rights, please contact us at: gaston.effa@gmail.com

privacy.thanks: If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us. Thank you for your trust!
